title: AIOU gears up celebrations of independence day
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 09 (APP): Allama Iqbal Open University (AIOU) has completed its preparations for the nationâ€™s Independence Day celebrations.
According to the AIOU, following the guidance of Vice-Chancellor, Professor Dr. Nasir Mahmood, the campus has been decorated with national flags and illuminated buildings, creating a festive atmosphere. Visitors, including families and youth, have been flocking to the university in the evenings to enjoy the decorations, sparking patriotic enthusiasm.
It is worth mentioning that Allama Iqbal Open University regularly celebrates Independence Day with great enthusiasm every year.
Vice-Chancellor, Professor Dr. Nasir Mahmood, had instructed that this year, we should celebrate Independence Day in such a way that it becomes an example for educational institutions across the country.
AIOU is among the first institutions to finalize its preparations, setting a high standard for other educational institutions.
Vice-Chancellor, Professor Dr. Nasir Mahmood, commended Estate Officer Rao Zia Ur Rehman for his efforts in decorating the university and congratulated the entire Estate Office team for their diligent execution of duties.
